channel.title: 2005Scape - RuneSource Server
channel.description:
:([size=24pt][center][b]2005Scape[/b][/center][/size]
[b]10+ players all day, first day of release![/b]
There is currently no website, so you can download the client [b]HERE[/b]: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/4viq8ixlpulnn35/2005Scape.jar]Download 2005Scape Client[/url]
I was originally just going to familiarize myself with this base but I see a lot of people want me to host it so I've decided to host it. The server is based off RuneSource, a perfect base for a remake. The server itself isn't a remake, but it will have most of RuneScape's 2005 content such as data, minigames, dialogue, combat, and soon quests. The XP rate is also very slow (x40 per hit which might be increased depending on feedback).
Features
[code] Clue scrolls Minigames Sound Old RuneScape music Random events Full city dialogues/interaction Every skill works Correct 377 npc drops All prayers Every spell working
A lot more, come see for yourself [/code]
ALOT more media will be coming soon.
[spoiler=Media - Basic Skilling (All skills work)] [img]http://puu.sh/aZ4jy/52400378db.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/aZ4po/3860226dd8.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/aZ4tf/93f5113563.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/aZ4yX/b4aa523cf1.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/aZ4Es/835f5eef3e.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/aZ4Ja/dfc61daad0.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/aZ5tg/8758622d11.jpg[/img] [/spoiler]
[spoiler=Media - Combat] [img]http://puu.sh/aZ4Wc/5a327e43e7.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/aZ55J/bd0d0997d7.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/aZ5i6/0cd0742447.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/aZ5MT/772bcf2353.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/aSXNA/091d237eb0.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/aQ63t/3680cdebc4.png[/img]
[/spoiler]
[spoiler=Media - Miscellaneous pictures]
[img]http://puu.sh/aXGnp/9667f6c0f3.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/aSXNA/091d237eb0.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/aZ68G/95e3756880.png[/img]
[/spoiler]

item.title: 2005Scape - RuneSource Server
item.dc:creator: @Artorias Artorias
item.description:
@Artorias wrote:

Michael P:

Uses 2006Scape (with 377 cache), calls it 2005Scape.

I’ve been upgrading the data since I got the domain. The Server name will be changed once I make up my mind of what data I want to use but as of right now it’s not official

item.title: 2005Scape - RuneSource Server
item.dc:creator: @Artorias Artorias
item.description:
@Artorias wrote:

:([size=24pt][center]2005Scape[/center][/size]

10+ players all day, first day of release!

There is currently no website, so you can download the client HERE: Download 2005Scape Client

I was originally just going to familiarize myself with this base but I see a lot of people want me to host it so I’ve decided to host it. The server is based off RuneSource, a perfect base for a remake. The server itself isn’t a remake, but it will have most of RuneScape’s 2005 content such as data, minigames, dialogue, combat, and soon quests. The XP rate is also very slow (x40 per hit which might be increased depending on feedback).

Features

Clue scrolls
Minigames
Sound
Old RuneScape music
Random events
Full city dialogues/interaction
Every skill works
Correct 377 npc drops
All prayers
Every spell working

A lot more, come see for yourself

ALOT more media will be coming soon.
